member_organisations: The Member Organisations of EIPG can be found on the association's website at: http://eipg.eu/member-states/
fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Public Health
eu_initiatives: EIPG provides regular feedback to draft legislation and consultation documents issued by the European Commission, as well as feedback on guidelines, concept papers and reflection papers issued by the European Medicines Agency.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: EIPG participates annually at the meeting with Interested Parties of the GMP/GDP Inspectors Working Group of the European Medicines Agency.
goals__remit: E.I.P.G. is a European association representing the national, professional organizations of pharmacists employed in the pharmaceutical or allied industries of the Member States of the European Union, the European Economic Area, or European countries having a mutual recognition agreement with the European Union on compliance control of regulated medicines.
relevant_communication: The Association’s professional activities include participation in European projects, promulgation and publication of Codes and Guidelines, maintaining a website and other communication vehicles for its members, commenting on draft directives and guidelines published by European institutions such as the European Commission and the European Medicines Agency, arranging working group meetings, and organization of any events enabling the Association to achieve its aims.
